duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide day-to-day services to program participants, including personal care, household maintenance, and meal preparation.
Administer medications and follow routines of individuals, such as Behavior Support Plans and Physical Therapy.
Accompany individuals on appointments and provide ongoing opportunities for individuals to assume increasing control over their daily lives.
Receive training on CPR/First Aid, Safety Care, Defensive Driving, and Medication Administration Program (MAP)
